text: George Beverly "Bev" Shea (February 1, 1909 - April 16, 2013) was a Canadian- American singer and songwriter of gospel music, and has written several hymns. He gained American citizenship in 1941. He worked with Billy Graham for over 60 years. ==References== Category:American centenarians Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Canadian centenarians Category:Canadian singer- songwriters Category:Musicians from Ontario Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:1909 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American gospel musicians
title: George Beverly Shea
